Mingle controllers v1.2.5
  • All Classes
 

Package com.peyrona.mingle.controllers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CellSet
    This Controller can be imagined as a simple spreadsheet: it is an arbitrary set of cells and every cell can contain a value or a formula.
    Cells have a name to refer to them (a cell is the equivalent to a variable in traditional languages).
    ControllerBase
    This is the base class for controllers written in Java language.
    DataBase
    This Controller initializes a SQL DataBase Server using JDBC and sends SQL commands to it.
    Excel
    This Controller writes values to a file using MS Excel format.
    File  
    HttpClient  
    Kronos
    A Linux Cron style Controller.
    OutputStream
    This Controller send device's value to terminal (standard output).
    SocketClient
    A controller to manage client plain-old Sockets and WebSockets.
    SunFreeTTS
    This Controller send device's value to Sun FreeTTS.

    See note at ControllerBase API doc.
    SystemClock
    This Controller periodically informs about the time elapsed since ExEn started.
    Telegram
    This Controller send device's value to: a Telegram-Bot.
    WeatherOpenMeteo
    This Controller retrieves weather information from OpenMeteo web service.
    Maximum allowed forecast is 1 week.
